pageContent: Barrier Miner (Broken Hill, NSW : 1888 - 1954), Friday 4 March 1949, page 5National Library of Australiahttp://nla.gov.au/nla.news-article48587046RaisedDevilsLondon,March4.-Aleister?Crowley,mysticandauthorofbooksonblackmagic,whowasonceexpelledfromItaly,forpractisingprivateritualsandrites,leftonly£18inbiswill,publishedthisweek.Crowley,whostyledhimself"Theworstmanintheworld,"diedInDecember,1947,aged72.Duringhislifetime,Crow-ley,whoinherited£30,900,-travelledinthe,Orient,andrana"temple"inLondon,inwhichhe.claimedtoraisedevilsinitsmirror-linedwalls."Hewentbankruptin1934afterlosing-alibelaction.
